parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="335" y="160" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-20" value="port:8082" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="505" y="160" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-22" value="HTTP/port:8080" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fillColor=#f5f5f5;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=#666666;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="460" y="-40" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-23" value="<b><i><u>api-gateway</u></i></b> - is the <strong data-end="95" data-start="80">entry point</strong> for all client requests in a <strong data-end="155" data-start="125">microservices architecture</strong>. It acts as a <strong data-end="187" data-start="170">reverse proxy</strong> that routes requests to the appropriate microservices while handling <strong data-end="312" data-start="257">authentication, rate limiting, logging, and caching</strong>." style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="335" width="250" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-24" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="126.93" y="285" width="280" height="245" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-25" value="Microservice server" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="126.93" y="285" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-34" value="TCP/port:8081" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="266.93" y="285" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-35" value="<b><u><i>order-service</i></u></b> (microservice) - does not have exposed endpoints, but it can provide exposed port, that allows to connect to this microservice via client connection. For each controller instance it should include&nbsp;@MessagePattern() decorator" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="135.93" y="344" width="168.07" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-45" value="" style="group;rotation=-90;" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="269" y="392" width="200" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="80NmhblBwdhf46L16tHD-41" value="product-service" rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 15px; margin-left: 194px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: api-gateway - is the entry point for all client requests in a microservices architecture. It acts as a reverse proxy that routes requests to the appropriate microservices while handling authentication, rate limiting, logging, and caching.

switch.text: api-gateway - is the entry point for all...

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

div.div: order-service (microservice) - does not have exposed endpoints, but it can provide exposed port, that allows to connect to this microservice via client connection. For each controller instance it should include @MessagePattern() decorator
